content: I was wondering if should we automatically nominate p-critical issues?
currently as part of the weekly agenda we do process them separately and end discussing them
but maybe we should just move them to the nominated issues section of the agenda and just consider them as the first nominated issues to discuss
I guess it's a matter of taste but this may be better and we can include that in triagebot
once an issue is tagged with P-critical automatically tag it as I-nominated
